    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    algorithms
    A class for the algorithm function of the application
    Animation
    A class for the opening animation of the application
    authentication
    Handles authentication and login functionality for employees.
    employee
    Represents an employee and its common features.
    IntegerAscendingComparator
    A comparator for comparing two integers in ascending order.
    manager
    The Manager class extends the Employee class and provides functionality for managing employees in a company, such as hiring, firing, and updating profiles.
    regularEmployee
    Represents the regular employee and its features which are uniqe for regular employee class It extends the employee class inherits certain properties
    start
    The start class handles user authentication, and provides utility methods for input validation, screen clearing, and database connection.
